name: MultiStorey Police Car Parking 2016 - Multi Level Park Plaza Driving Simulator 3D
name_original: MultiStorey Police Car Parking 2016 - Multi Level Park Plaza Driving Simulator 3D
description:
With car parking 2016, buckle up for a fantastic multistory Police car parking trip. This city police car driving and parking mania simulation is inspired by the actual car driving and parking school rules of steering the car on the parking spot in park plaza. Use your garage parking plaza and underground parking skills to wriggle into the multi level car parking simulator park zone.

Learn how to navigate in the realistic stunning park plaza environment to the Police checkpoints near the mall. Get ready to play 5 levels of multilevel plaza tasks in the park zone. Your mission is to drive up and down the realistic 3D multistory parking lot and locate your parking spot. Steer the car meticulously and tactfully to help you find your parking plaza spot. Follow the highlighted arrows (checkpoints) as parking spot locator. Use the varying gears and shifts (P-Park, R-Reverse, n- Neutral and D-drive) to wiggle into the park zone. Avoid crashing into barriers, parked cars and other cars finding their parking space in the multilevel plaza. Enjoy an exciting playtime in the latest Police Car Multi-Storey Parking 3D car games to play with steering wheels for free.

Get ready for one of the Most Realistic Parking Mania! Drive and Park awesome police cars and jeeps in a realistic multilevel car parking 3d simulator park plaza. Enjoy the bombastic experience of multilevel plaza parking in the most realistic 3d multistory parking game. Download the Police Car Parking 2016 today for it is the accurate parking simulation game,
